name: ledScreen.clear
content: Used to turn off all of the LEDs previously activated on the micro:bit screen.

examples.name: Turn off the 4 Corner lights
examples.description: Using the ledScreen.clear() you will turn off the 4 LEDs located in the corners of the board.

examples.name: Vanishing Diagonal Lines
examples.description: Click the A Button to turn off each of the LED lights

short_description: Turns off all LEDs on the LED Screen
